Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: Yo peeps we're talking about Australia's Treasurer Jim Chalmers in these recent news drops. Homeboy recently attended major economic meetings in the US and is flying back fresher than ever to finalize the federal budget which is expected to be a big one. Chalmers' also commissioned an independent review of the Reserve Bank and plans to overhaul the tax system to provide some cost-of-living relief. Watch out for these big moves y'all!
